i am a new player and the experience is by far the most horrific one i've had in years. why you assume?

i've played 2 quick matches and guess what, my team had 3 bots, i have no single clue how a company as blizzard puts bots into games even though the player count is good. games like paladins that have a significantly lower player count search for actual players based on their past or current ranks (take notes blizzard)

the weird default controls bother me too, i was playing reinhardt in my matches (he is the most fun in my opinion). how the heck am i supposed to shield the others while holding E and trying to wasd, however this is not a so big issue as you can set the keybinds differently for every hero (this is well done, the default key configuration isn't)

the sensivity is too high even if it's low (im using low dpi).

even tough i played a little, i can already say i won't ever touch this game again

don't play if you don't like losing
Did you know that Overwatch 2 takes place 8 hours after the events of Overwatch 1? The time of day is different

Been playing since 2016. I want the armor packs and the shield generator back.

I spent 40 USD for this sh*t back in 2016. And I had fun with it. Then with time, they decided to go and kill anything this game had going for it by making stupid balance changes, and adding completely uninspired characters with the writing of a 13 year old's original character. After I quit because I was simply fed up with the game and all of Blizzard's bullsh*t, they decide to spit in my face and make it free, and rename it to Overwatch 2. They do this while promising big new things for this "new" game, and then immediately fall back on it and cancel all of those plans. And don't even get me started on the predatory in game store. So now I am stuck here, with 40 dollars out of my pocket years later, annoyed, and finally able to speak out about this sh*theap of a game. F*ck you Blizzard, give me my 40 USD back.
Buying skins in Overwatch 2 is like paying for breast milk
